doc:
Charles Gordone https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Gordone 0 Charles Gordone (October 12, 1925 – November 16, 1995) was an American playwright, actor, director, and educator. He was the first African American to win the annual Pulitzer Prize for Drama and he devoted much of his professional life to the pursuit of multi-racial American theater and racial unity. Charles_Gordone ( October_12_,_1925 – November_16_,_1995 ) was an_American_playwright , actor , director , and educator . He was the_first_African_American to_win the_annual_Pulitzer_Prize for Drama and he devoted much of his_professional_life to the_pursuit of multi-racial_American_theater and racial_unity .
